About the job
Headquartered in Singapore, we are a fast-growing software start-up developing cloud and mobile applications for the Building and Construction Industry. Our mission is to help customers improve productivity, quality and safety. Our solutions are used daily by thousands of professionals. We are expanding our product portfolio as well as our presence across Asia and Europe.

We are looking for a Software Developer located in Asia who will be working in our development team to enhance the Novade Enterprise application.
 
What you will be doing
Develop new features in the Novade Enterprise application using the Upvise Javascript-based framework
Improve, refactor and maintain existing features to ensure scalability, performance and reliability
Collaborate with a product manager, QA, and services teams to define requirements and deliver stable solutions
Investigate and fix bugs reported in production environments
Participate in code reviews and help maintain coding standards and best practices

What you need for this position
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent professional experience
Solid experience with Javascript
Understanding of web application development patterns
Ability to write clean, structured and maintainable code
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
Good communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to work collaboratively with the rest of the development team

Top reasons to work with us
Attractive compensation package
Work on real-world tools used daily by thousands of professionals
Impact from day one, contributing directly to features used daily on active construction projects
Join a talented, dynamic and experienced team
Significant growth opportunities in a fast-scaling company
Flexible working arrangements, including the possibility to work remotely

If you are looking for a place where your achievements will be recognized, rewarded and celebrated a place where you won’t be lost in the crowd and a place where fun is a cultural value, then we are that place for you. We are Novade and we are looking for you.
